pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.1_0: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.2_0: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.3_0: Akkhāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.4_0: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.5_0: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṁ aṅgajātaṁ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.7_0: methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.8_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.13_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.16_0: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.18_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:1.21_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca, paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.16:2.1_0: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.16:2.2_0: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:2.4_0: anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā imaṁ ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:2.5_0: Sā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr1.16:2.10_0: Sā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajati—
pli-tv-pvr1.16:2.15_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:2.18_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti.
